text: Yidina du'i dale parasparara sanmukhina haichila se'idina tomalokara majara paraa yisakale prstha pradarsana karaichila, sihamtara kichumana krtakarmara phalata cayatane'i sihamtara padaskhalana ghata'ichila. Arasya allahe sihamtaka ksama karaiche. Niscaya allaha ksamaparaayana arau parama sahanasila
